Hydras:

"Divide the troops in balanced teams, the one holding Inferno will come with 
me, retain enough to defend this... Decrepid bas "Hissed Hdyras"And Follow 
me"

Hdyras took off and Flew towards the Ark but in a way that they wont be 
detected by Maximals and Autobots. While he was traveling he send a message 
to his inside minion " Be ready, we are on the way to pick you... "
-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, February 21, 2011 10:59 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Falling Back!

> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled and said "I have the perfect distraction, who of our 
> soldiers
> is in good shape, Cyclonus? How can you cover my signature?"

<NEW>

Cyclonus paused thoughtfully. "From the reports I got, Deepstryke is
undamaged as is Scourge, but Phobia took several hits in the battle.
She will most likely need a CR chamber before she can go into battle
again."

The was another pause as Cyclonus consulted via radio with several
others. "Waspinator is unhurt as is Inferno, however we haven't heard
anything from Terrorsaur, we don't know what has happened." Cyclonus
paused again as he got more information. "The Fuzors, Injector,
Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike are all okay, although thier
leader Skyshadow has some batle damage."

"Insecticon, Bruticus-X, Fractyl, Iguanus and Tarantulus are all in
good condition as well" Cyclonus said as he got the last bit of
information from the troops. "I don't think any of your troops are any
condition for a full scale assault without a good recharge, but we are
good enough for now."

Cyclonus pondered Hydras' other question, "As to hiding your
signature, that is no easy task for any of us." Sighing Cyclonus
continued, "However the sweeps positioned carefully around you you
could fly in virtually undected, but that would only help you as long
as you stayed out of visual range. The sweeps don't actually turn
invisable to sight as much as they distort sensors crating a haze of
invisiblity for sensors."

(TAG)

Preston
